venue.name: Middlesex Fells - Long Pond Parking Area

item.description:
Even though it may be cold I'm planning to walk the fells today .
Please feel free to join us we have a few hikers from another group.

Please join for us a <2 hour walk through the Middlesex Fells on the Fire Roads. Enjoy the beautful scenery from the comfort of the (relatively) flat dirt roads that surround the reservoirs.
We'll start from the Long Pond Parking Lot at 9:00 am (leaving no later than 9:10).

Dogs are very welcome If you want to cut the trip short, feel free to head back early. The pace will not be super fast (dogs get distracted and are distracting).

A nice map of the Fells can be found here:
http://www.fellsbiker....
The Long Pond Parking lot is # 13 on the map (on the Northern end of South Border Road in Winchester)

Hope to see you on Saturday

Location:
Long Pond Parking Area
500 South Border Road
Winchester, MA 01890
